name: libc-uClibc-version
description: The presence of the uClibc library was detected in the libc.so.0 file, but the current environment limitations prevent precise extraction of version information. GCC 4.2.3 compilation details were identified in the string output, which may represent the compilation environment for uClibc. Further analysis in a more complete environment is recommended to obtain accurate version information.
notes: A more complete environment or tools are required to accurately extract the uClibc version information. The GCC version information may help infer the approximate version range of uClibc.

name: SBOM-BusyBox-wget-implementation
description: SBOM report for usr/bin/wget (symbolic link to busybox). The wget command in this firmware is implemented through BusyBox 1.13.0. No known high-risk vulnerabilities were found for this specific version in the NVD database.
